name: ChillPoker
description:
ChillPoker

( Doesn't really work on phones. )

A small video poker game made to honor the memory of a friend.

The goal of the game is to build the strongest poker hand possible over two rounds.

(Round 1)

Step 1 - Bet

Step 2 - Press Deal Button

(Round 2)

Step 3 - Select Cards to Hold

Step 4 - Press Deal Button

Step 5 - Profit??? (and goto Step 1)

Payouts are determined by the pay table on the top portion of the screen.
